oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-08-16 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 17, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Prairie Songbirds; Hiram Higsby; Dick Reinhart; Mary Lou
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening theme and statements / (1:26) Hiram Higsby introduces Chuck Davis / (1:35) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Golden Slippers" / (2:57) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:18) The Prairie Songbirds perform "I’ll Go Riding Down That Old Texas Trail" / (4:53) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (5:43) Hiram Higsby performs "The Little Shirt That Mother Made For Me" / (6:59) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (7:57) Dick Reinhart performs "Sing Cowboy Sing" / (9:53) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (10:55) Mary Lou performs "Waltz Of The Hills" / (12:36) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (13:16) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
